title: The harvest is at hand, vvherin the tares shall be bound, and cast into the fyre and brent. [...]
author: Champneys, John, fl. 1548.
publisher: By Humfrey Powell, dwellyng aboue Holvurne Conduit. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
